title: [Self-directed] Cost Analysis of Virtual University Education: Application of Activity-Based Costing (ABC) Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Financial Management and Educational Operations Processes
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in virtual education cost analysis for operating corporate language training programs.

learning_goals: The ABC model can be utilized to classify and estimate costs for key activities in a virtual education program
The proportion of costs attributed to human resources (instructional design and teaching activities) in educational operations can be analyzed
Cost-effective virtual education operation strategies can be proposed based on analysis results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
